title: beatiful
desc: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born.

title: beatiful
desc: I will give you a complete account of the system.

title: beatiful
desc: I will expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.

title: beatiful
desc: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure.

title: beatiful
desc: Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain.

title: beatiful
desc: To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it?

title: beatiful
desc: But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences.

title: beatiful
desc: But because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.

title: beatiful
desc: Or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

title: beatiful
desc: But because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure

title: beatiful
desc: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born.

title: beatiful
desc: Or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?
